presets.author: Artyom «ZKoshak» Krukovsky
presets.ru.author: Артём «Зелёный Кошак» Крюковский(ZKoshak)
presets.description: Preset for tagging trees growing in Russia
presets.ru.description: Заготовка для тегирования деревьев произрастающих на территории России

list_entry.short_description: Trees remarkable due to its size or prominent location, usually visible from great distances and useful for navigation.
Especially old tree, often with a particular shape. Usually protected for its uniqueness.
Trees found within settlements, e.g. in parks or spread through residential areas.

label.text: (can be specified for feeding what animals are used, in english)
label.ru.text: (можно указать для подкормки каких животных используется, на английском)
